TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SecurityTokenTypes extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains a set of static properties that returns strings that represent security token types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use SecurityTokenTypes to specify the security token type that must be included in a SOAP message sent by a client or required by a service. To specify the security token type requirement, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.TokenType%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets a string that represents a security token based upon a Kerberos ticket.
Docs.value: A string that represents a security token based upon a Kerberos ticket.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The two types of security tokens that are based on a Kerberos ticket are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken>.

Docs.returns: A string that represents a security token based upon a Kerberos ticket.

Docs.summary: Gets a string that represents a security token based upon an RSA key.
Docs.value: A string that represents a security token based upon an RSA key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken> security token is based upon an RSA key.

Docs.returns: A string that represents a security token based upon an RSA key.

Docs.summary: Gets a string that represents a security token based upon a SAML assertion.
Docs.value: A string that represents a security token based upon a SAML assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token is based upon a SAML assertion.

Docs.returns: A string that represents a security token based upon a SAML assertion.

Docs.summary: Gets a string that represents a security token based upon a user name and password.
Docs.value: A string that represents a security token based upon a user name and password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token is based upon a user name and password.

Docs.returns: A string that represents a security token based upon a user name and password.

Docs.summary: Gets a string that represents a security token based upon an X.509 certificate.
Docs.value: A string that represents a security token based upon an X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token is based upon an X.509 certificate.

Docs.returns: A string that represents a security token based upon an X.509 certificate.
